news.title: New clues in hunt for Charlie Kirk's killer
news.summary: BBC Verify’s Nick Beake has been looking at newly released footage of the suspect and what we know about his escape.

news.title: 'Please come forward,' Stephen Lawrence's mum says to witnesses as review begins
news.summary: Baroness Lawrence says review, triggered by BBC investigation, is the last opportunity for justice.

news.title: The wedding crasher mystery solved after four years
news.summary: For years Michelle and John Wylie were puzzled about the presence of a mysterious tall man in a blue suit at their wedding.

news.title: Watch: 'Looks like a toy, but it's real': BBC examines a downed Russian drone
news.summary: Drones like this one were shot down over Polish airspace in the early hours of Wednesday.

news.title: Ros Atkins on... Israel's war in Gaza and proportionality
news.summary: BBC Verify asked experts, in the UK and elsewhere, if Israel’s actions in Gaza have been proportionate.

news.title: Prince Harry vows to help war injured during surprise visit to Ukraine
news.summary: The Duke of Sussex said he wanted to do "everything possible" to help the recovery of military personnel injured in the war with Russia.

news.title: Former president Bolsonaro sentenced to 27 years in prison for plotting Brazil coup
news.summary: The former president has been found guilty of trying to mount coup to cling to power after he lost the election.

news.title: More school-starters missing key skills like toilet training, teachers say
news.summary: Teaching unions say schools are "picking up the pieces" as more children are starting reception without key skills.

news.title: Young fans and critics debate Charlie Kirk's political legacy
news.summary: Kirk attracted fervent crowds, bringing young people into conservative politics, while at the same time shocking some with provocative opinions.

news.title: Rifle found but suspect still at large - what we know about the shooting
news.summary: The FBI releases new pictures of a "person of interest" as a large manhunt is under way for the suspect.
